use.flag: Add a dependency upon Perl and install the script to update the Core Rule Set. Please note that this script will use the original Core Rule Set, and it's currently mostly untested.

Provide the original ModSecurity Core Rule Set without Gentoo-specific relaxation. When this flag is enabled, we install the unadulterated Core Rule Set. Warning! The original Core Rule Set is draconic and most likely will break your web applications, including Rails-based web applications and Bugzilla.

Configure ModSecurity to query the GeoIP database from MaxMind, provided by dev-libs/geoip. This flag only controls the default configuration, as the GeoIP query code is part of ModSecurity's source code.
Build the ModSecurity Audit Log Collector (mlogc) that depends on net-misc/curl.
